Author: rongarvin99#8336
Content: I want to move funds out of a paper wallet. I just downloaded ocean wallet. It brings up the remaining balance on my old agama wallet even though I uninstalled it. How to I transfer my paper wallet funds to the ocean wallet?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you don't transfer from app to app. you transfer from address to address

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you need to import prrivate key of your paper wallet into KomodoOceanQT wallet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: and, you will be able to access all your funds

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029939-how-to-import-private-keys-into-komodo-ocean-wallet

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: check this guide for help with importing key

Author: rongarvin99#8336
Content: ok, got it. Now, how to I claim rewards with this wallet? I don‚Äôt see any guides for that

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: send all balance to self address. that will claim your accrued reward

Author: rongarvin99#8336
Content: so then rewards are automatically added to balance? with old agama you had to click a button to add in or actually claim those rewards

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: The button was just a convienence tool

Author: Max#3774
Content:
Hey all.  I've been working a lot recently, and haven't had a chance to sort out my funds, after the most recent drama.  AND, before any of this security issue with the Agama wallet was discovered, my version of Agama was bugged, (I think I had shut it down incorrectly, and corrupted the blockchain) but I wasn't worried, because I have all of my private keys safely stored.  Basically, it only worked in lite mode, because I think my local blockchain had been corrupted, and it would not sync.  Just stalls out at Activating Best Chain.

Now I'm running into a tonne of issues getting my Agama wallet started up, just to see if I am one of the unlucky people to have had my KMD scooped out of my wallet.

When I start Agama in light mode, my balance is there, but the wallet is not synced, and I can't send the KMD ."Error Unable to get transactions history data. Code ApiElectrumTransactions".  I am running Agama v 0.3.4.

Any ideas about how I can resolve this?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Max 
Install https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.5.7-3
Disable proxy: https://support.komodoplatform.com/solution/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers/
Login using old seed phrase: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@Max 
also,
create a new wallet(new seed) and transfer all your coins to the new address
(Verify that the newly created seed phrase gives you the same address every time)

Author: Max#3774
Content: I'll give that a shot.  Thank you!

Author: Max#3774
Content: Wow, worked, and very simple.  Thanks @gcharang !
